note:
EpicNews.ca - Epic News from Canada and all over the world!

...just another completely indie Canadian news site balancing between the sensational and what really matters.

We try to bring the focus towards humanities, environment, politics, sports, technology, travel and local Canadian news from across the country.

But may end up with the occasional news story about Drake. Just because he's Canadian too.

And we do love hockey and poutine!

note: Professor and Director, IDCE, Clark University; Founder of the Humanitarian Response and Development Lab (HURDL); Adaptation Panel Member on STAPGEF; IPCC AR6 LA; IPBES Transformation Assessment LA; Masters T&F All-American; Hopelessly realistic optimist

“You maniacs! You blew it up! Damn you!” Part time escapee to La Isla Nena. Realist, nearly-retired with respect for the Earth. He/him.  “We’re not going back.” -Vice President Kamala Harris  “If you want to change the future, start living as if you’re already there” -Lynn Conway “In a world of chaos, the learners shall inherit the earth, while the learned shall find themselves perfectly suited for a world that no longer exists” - Eric Hoffer

Worked in Democratic politics as researcher and #speechwriter for two #Democrat city council members. My father and grandfather emigrated from Oldham, England in 1912.
